description: Method received invalid argument that violates its contract. Common when passing invalid parameters to Android APIs.
commonCauses: Passing invalid color value to setColor()
Out of range indices or positions
Null passed where non-null required (Java APIs)
solutions: Validate all inputs before passing to APIs
Use require() for parameter validation in Kotlin
Add bounds checking for numeric parameters
Use safe parsing with try-catch for user input
Use sealed classes for restricted parameter sets
prevention: Use Kotlin's type system to restrict invalid values
Use inline classes for validated types
Use value classes for domain-specific types
Test edge cases and boundary conditions
